description: This source file provides functions to manage gym class bookings, including listing, fetching by ID, creating, updating, deleting, and enrolling in classes. It interacts with a Supabase backend and contains business logic related to booking capacity.

methods.name: list({ page = 1, limit = 20, memberId, classId, status, from, to } = {})
methods.description: Lists bookings with optional filters for memberId, classId, status, and date range, including pagination and count.

methods.name: getById(id)
methods.description: Fetches a single booking record by its unique ID.

methods.name: create(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new booking record with the provided payload.

methods.name: update(id, patch)
methods.description: Updates an existing booking identified by ID with the provided patch data.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes a booking record by its ID.

methods.name: enrollInClass({ memberId, classId })
methods.description: Enrolls a member into a class, checking capacity constraints, and creating a booking with confirmed status.

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^export async function list({ page = 1, limit = 20, memberId, classId, status, from, to } = {}) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ page = 1, limit = 20, memberId, classId, status, from, to } = {})
